001package violajones_utils;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
005import java.io.InputStream;
006import java.util.List;
007
008import ij.IJ;
009import ij.ImagePlus;
010import ij.ImageStack;
011import ij.gui.Overlay;
012import ij.gui.Roi;
013import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
017import imagingbook.violajones.DATA.HaarTrainingSet;
018import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeatureNode;
019import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeaturePatch;
020import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeatureTree;
021import imagingbook.violajones.lib.HaarCascadeDescriptor;
022import imagingbook.violajones.lib.Stage;
023
024/**
025 * ImageJ plugin. Visualizes the evaluation sequence for the selected Haar cascade.
026 * The current image is scaled to the size of the cascade (typ. 32x32)
027 * and shown in the background. 
028 * The result is an image stack, with one slice for classifier
029 * each decision step.
030 * 
031 * Feature support regions are shown as vector overlays.
032 * 
033 * @author WB
034 *
035 */
036public class Visualize_Haar_Cascade_Overlay implements PlugInFilter {
037        
038        static HaarTrainingSet desc = HaarTrainingSet.FrontalFaceAlt2;
039
040        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
041                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
042        }
043
044        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
045        
046                InputStream strm = desc.getStream();
047                if (strm == null) {
048                        IJ.log("could not open training set");
049                        return;
050                }
051                
052                HaarCascadeDescriptor cascade = HaarCascadeDescriptor.fromInputStream(strm);
053                int w = cascade.getWidth();
054                int h = cascade.getHeight();
055                
056                List<Stage> stages = cascade.getStages();
057                
058                // create and populate the stack
059                ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(w, h);
060                ImageProcessor sp1 = ip.resize(w, h);
061                
062                int stageCtr = 0;
063                for (Stage stage : stages) {
064                        int treeCtr = 0;
065                        for (FeatureTree tree : stage.getTrees()) {
066                                int featureCtr = 0;
067                                for (@SuppressWarnings("unused") 
068                                                FeatureNode feature : tree.getFeatures()) {
069                                        ImageProcessor sp = sp1; // duplicate needed?
070                                        stack.addSlice("Stage=" + stageCtr + " Tree=" + treeCtr + " Feat=" + featureCtr, sp);
071                                        featureCtr++;
072                                }
073                                treeCtr++;
074                        }
075                        stageCtr++;
076                }
077
078                // add overlay graphics
079                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
080                int sliceNo = 1;
081                for (Stage stage : stages) {
082                        for (FeatureTree tree : stage.getTrees()) {
083                                for (FeatureNode feature : tree.getFeatures()) {
084                                        for (FeaturePatch r : feature.getPatches()) {
085                                                Color col = (r.weight > 0) ? Color.green : Color.red;
086                                                Roi box = makeBoxRoi(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height, col);
087                                                box.setPosition(sliceNo);
088                                                oly.add(box);
089                                        }
090                                        sliceNo++;
091                                }
092                        }
093                }
094                
095                ImagePlus stackim = new ImagePlus("Cascade", stack);
096                stackim.setOverlay(oly);
097                stackim.show();
098                GuiTools.zoomExact(stackim, 10);
099                
100        }
101        
102        private Roi makeBoxRoi(int u, int v, int width, int height, Color col) {
103                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
104                path.moveTo(u, v);
105                path.lineTo(u + width, v);
106                path.lineTo(u + width, v + height);
107                path.lineTo(u, v + height);
108                path.lineTo(u, v);
109                path.lineTo(u + width, v + height);
110                ShapeRoi box = new ShapeRoi(path);
111                box.setStrokeColor(col);
112                //box.setStrokeWidth(0.2);
113                return box;
114        }
115

146}
